DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate intubation duration between rapid sequence intubation technique (RSI) and non-rapid sequence intubation technique (non-RSI) performed by emergency medicine residents in Siriraj hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Intubation Duration Between Rapid Sequence Intubation (RSI) Technique and Non-RSI Technique
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective cohort study was conducted in the non-traumatic emergency department (ED).
DOC.criteria: patients required airway control by tracheal intubation cardiac arrest
